forum.name: General Questions Forum
forum.intro: This is a place for you to ask questions about how the course works (e.g. clarifications on due dates, etc.).  This is also a good place to get quick answers to questions about assignments, etc.  Please post your questions here rather than using e-mail since everyone gets to see the question and its answer if it is done here.  If you have a question it is likely that other people have the same question.  It is much better for me to answer it once for everyone than it is to respond to several dozen e-mails!
